text: @NYGovCuomo @melissadderosa Asymptomatic spread of coronavirus is ‘very rare,’ WHO says https://t.co/SDtBKfZEmZ they have the audacity to mock us with these headlines, should be a wake-up call to all American's, to keep making our voices heard until the people behind this Criminal act are brought to justice
